sentence.Network_en: Even relatively minor trauma can result in avulsion of the splenic substance.

sentence.Network_en: The splenic artery supplies the area of the fundus by way of the short gastric arteries.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To improve the treatment of hepatobiliary, pancreatic and splenic injury.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的提高外伤性肝胆胰脾损伤的治疗效果.
